name: Quarterly Full Stack Download Patch (QFSDP) for SPARC SuperCluster (Q2.2022)
author: p4vwd7
description:
Quarterly Full Stack Download Patch (QFSDP) for SPARC SuperCluster (Q2.2022)Год/Дата Выпуска: 2022
Версия: 21c Build Q2.2022
Разработчик: Oracle Corporation
Разрядность: 64bit
Язык интерфейса: Английский
Таблэтка: не требуется
Системные требования: Oracle SuperCluster
Описание:
This Oracle SuperCluster Full Stack download patch includes updates for the following components:
Infrastructure
Database
Systems Management
Each component contains the following list of patches :

Infrastructure:
ExadataStorageServer - contains updates to firmware, operating system, patchmgr plugins and Exadata Storage Server software (20.1.21.0.0 and 21.2.11.0.0)
SuperClusterMaintenanceUpdate - contains updates for :
SCMU_Q2.2022:
Solaris 11.4 SRU 43
SuperCluster Custom Incorporation for Solaris 11 SRU 43 v1.04
Exafamily Update 3.3.0.2075
Exafamily s10 packages for Update 3.3.0.2075
Oracle Solaris Cluster 4.4.12
ZFS Storage Appliance Software 2013.1.8.43 (OS 8.8.43)
M8-8 System Firmware 9.10.4.b
M7-8 System Firmware 9.10.4.b
M6-32 System Firmware 9.6.25.b
T5-8 System Firmware 9.6.25.b
T4-4 System Firmware 8.9.11
NOTE: The Solaris 10 Recommended CPU 2021/01 (patch 33761800) and Solaris Cluster 3.3u2 Patch Train #18 (Patch 145333-41) have been tested as part of Q2.2022 QFSDP. Solaris 10 and Solaris Cluster 3.3u2 updates are only available to customers that have purchased Extended Support. Please refer to the README.solaris and README.osc files included in the SCMU_2022.Q2/solaris directory of the unpacked Q2.2022. SunRackIIPDUMeteringUnitFirmware - updates the Sun Rack II PDU Metering Unit Firmware (1.06 for PDUv1 and 2.11 for PDUv2 only)
NM2 IB Switch Firmware 2.2-16-3
Database :
Database Patch for Engineered Systems and DB in-memory 12.1.0.2.220419 (Q2.2022) - contains updates to Oracle Database and Oracle Clusterware software (12.1.0.2.220419 DBBP Q2.2022)
Oracle JavaVM Component 12.1.0.2.220419 Database PSU (Q2.2022) - includes critical fixes for the Oracle JavaVM component (12.1.0.2.220419 OJVM PSU Q2.2022)
Database Patch for Engineered Systems and DB in-memory 19.15.0.0.220419 (Q2.2022) - contains updates to Oracle Database and Oracle Clusterware software (19.15.0.0.220419 GIRU Q2.2022)
Oracle JavaVM Component 19.15.0.0.220419 Database PSU (Q2.2022) - includes critical fixes for the Oracle JavaVM component (19.15.0.0.220419 OJVMRU Q2.2022)
OPatch - contains software to install/deinstall the 'Database component' patches for versions 12.2 (12.2.0.1.29)
OPlan - contains software that facilitates the 'Database component' patch installation process by providing you with step-by-step patching instructions specific to your environment (12.1.0.1.5)
Systems Management :
Our recommendation is to upgrade to the latest EM framework (13.4.2.2.0/13.5.0.0.0) with the latest released Exadata. Also, refer to My Oracle Support Note 1626579.1 to get to the latest required patches on top of the latest releases.
